name: Short title
text:
ARTICLE I
GENERAL PROVISIONS, DEFINITIONS, AND
PROBATE JURISDICTION OF COURT

PART 1.  SHORT TITLE, CONSTRUCTION, GENERAL PROVISIONS
Cross References
  Effect and transition of L 1996, c 288 amendments, see §560:8-201.
 §560:1-101   This chapter shall be known and may be cited as the Uniform Probate Code. [L 1996, c 288, pt of §1]
